Utility

Utility functions for use within the Data Pipeline

BindResults()

Helper function to bind results from multiple workflows

MakeCharts()

Helper function create charts for multiple metrics

MakeMetric()

Parse meta data from workflows to a data frame

MakeLongMeta()

Helper function to compile "long" group metadata

MakeWideGroups()

Helper function to compile "wide" group metadata

MakeWorkflowList()

Load workflows from a package/directory.

ParseThreshold()

This function takes a comma-separated string and parses it into a numeric vector. It checks if all values in the string are numeric and returns the parsed vector. If any value is not numeric, it throws an error.

RunStep()

Run a single step in a workflow.

RunQuery()

Run a SQL query with mapping and data

RunWorkflow()

Run a workflow via it's YAML specification.

RunWorkflows()

Convienience function to easily run multiple workflows

UseClindata()

UseClindata Function
